import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-colour-data', templateUrl: './colourdata.component.html', }) export class ColourDataComponent { public colourDatas: colourData[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'userdata/colour').subscribe(result => { this.colourDatas = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface colourData { id: string; firstName: string; lastName: string; dob: string; }
